Uses of Interface
xxl.core.spatial.geometries.Geometry2D

  • Packages that use Geometry2D 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.spatial.geometries
    The package geometries provides interfaces for a spatial data model which conforms to the geometry model of the OGC Simple Features Specification for SQL (See http://www.opengis.org for further details).
    xxl.core.spatial.geometries.cursors
    A collection of spatial queries.
    xxl.core.spatial.geometries.predicates
    Useful spatial predicates such as Contains, Overlap, DistanceWithin, etc .

    • Uses of Geometry2D in xxl.core.spatial.geometries

      Classes in xxl.core.spatial.geometries with type parameters of type Geometry2D 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  GeometryCollection2D<T extends Geometry2D>
      A GeometryCollection2D is a geometry that is a collection of 1 or more geometries.
      Subinterfaces of Geometry2D in xxl.core.spatial.geometries 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Curve2D
      A Curve is a one-dimensional geometric object usually stored as a sequence of points, with the subtype of Curve specifying the form of the interpolation between points.
      interface  GeometryCollection2D<T extends Geometry2D>
      A GeometryCollection2D is a geometry that is a collection of 1 or more geometries.
      interface  Line2D
      A Line is a LineString with exactly 2 points.
      interface  LinearRing2D
      A LinearRing is a LineString that is both closed and simple.
      interface  LineString2D
      A LineString is a Curve with linear interpolation between points.
      interface  MultiCurve2D<T extends Curve2D>
      A MultiCurve2D is a one-dimensional GeometryCollection whose elements are Curves.
      interface  MultiLineString2D<T extends LineString2D>
      A MultiLineString is a MultiCurve2D whose elements are LineStrings.
      interface  MultiPoint2D<T extends Point2D>
      A MultiPoint2D is a 0 dimensional GeometryCollection whose elements are Points.
      interface  MultiPolygon2D<T extends Polygon2D>
      This is a MultiSurface2D which can only hold Polygon2D- objects It does not provide additional functionality to MultiSurface but is implemented for completeness.
      interface  MultiSurface2D<T extends Surface2D>
      A GeometryCollection which can only hold Surface2D- objects

      See
      		interface  Point2D
      A Point2D is a 0-dimensional geometry and represents a single location in coordinate space.
      interface  Polygon2D
      A Curve is a one-dimensional geometric object usually stored as a sequence of points, with the subtype of Curve specifying the form of the interpolation between points.
      interface  Surface2D
      A Surface is a two-dimensional geometric object.
      Methods in xxl.core.spatial.geometries that return Geometry2D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Geometry2D Geometry2D.buffer(double width)
      Returns a geometry that represents all points whose distance from this Geometry2D is less than or equal to distance.
      Geometry2D Geometry2D.convexHull()
      Returns a geometry that represents the convex hull of this Geometry2D
      Geometry2D Geometry2D.difference(Geometry2D other)
      Returns a geometry that represents the point set difference of this Geometry2D and another Geometry2D.
      Geometry2D Geometry2D.getBoundary()
      Returns the closure of the combinatorial boundary of this Geometry2D.
      Geometry2D Geometry2D.getEnvelope()
      The minimum bounding box for this Geometry2D, returned as a Geometry2D.
      Geometry2D Geometry2D.intersection(Geometry2D other)
      Returns a geometry that represents the point set intersection of this Geometry2D and another Geometry2D.
      Geometry2D Geometry2D.symDifference(Geometry2D other)
      Returns a geometry that represents the point set symmetric difference of this Geometry2D and another Geometry2D.
      Geometry2D Geometry2D.union(Geometry2D other)
      Returns a geometry that represents the point set union of this Geometry2D and another Geometry2D.
      Methods in xxl.core.spatial.geometries with parameters of type Geometry2D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Geometry2D.contains(Geometry2D other)
      Returns true if this Geometry2D spatially contains another Geometry2D.
      boolean Geometry2D.covers(Geometry2D other)
      Returns true if this Geometry2D spatially covers another Geometry2D.
      boolean Geometry2D.crosses(Geometry2D other)
      Returns true if this Geometry2D spatially crosses another Geometry2D.
      Geometry2D Geometry2D.difference(Geometry2D other)
      Returns a geometry that represents the point set difference of this Geometry2D and another Geometry2D.
      double Geometry2D.distance(Geometry2D other)
      Returns the shortest distance between any two points in the two geometries as calculated in the spatial reference system of this Geometry2D.
      boolean Geometry2D.equals(Geometry2D other)
      Returns true if this Geometry2D is spatially equal to another Geometry2D.
      Geometry2D Geometry2D.intersection(Geometry2D other)
      Returns a geometry that represents the point set intersection of this Geometry2D and another Geometry2D.
      boolean Geometry2D.intersects(Geometry2D other)
      Returns true if this Geometry2D spatially intersects another Geometry2D.
      boolean Geometry2D.isCoveredBy(Geometry2D other)
      Returns true if this Geometry2D is spatially covered by another Geometry2D.
      boolean Geometry2D.isDisjoint(Geometry2D other)
      Returns true if this Geometry2D is spatially disjoint from another Geometry2D.
      boolean Geometry2D.isWithin(Geometry2D other)
      Returns true if this Geometry2D is spatially within another Geometry2D.
      boolean Geometry2D.overlaps(Geometry2D other)
      Returns true if this Geometry2D spatially overlaps another Geometry2D.
      boolean Geometry2D.relate(Geometry2D other, String intersectionPattern)
      Checks if this Geometry2D is spatially related to another Geometry2D, by testing for intersections between the Interior, Boundary and Exterior of the two geometries as specified by the values in the intersectionPattern
      Returns true if the elements in the DE-9IM IntersectionMatrix for the two Geometrys match the elements in intersectionPattern.
      Geometry2D Geometry2D.symDifference(Geometry2D other)
      Returns a geometry that represents the point set symmetric difference of this Geometry2D and another Geometry2D.
      boolean Geometry2D.touches(Geometry2D other)
      Returns true if this Geometry2D spatially touches another Geometry2D.
      Geometry2D Geometry2D.union(Geometry2D other)
      Returns a geometry that represents the point set union of this Geometry2D and another Geometry2D.

      boolean DistanceWithin.invoke(Geometry2D left, Geometry2D right)
      Returns true if the distance between geometry left and geometry right does not exceed the specified maximum distance.
